name: Remote CSV Data Display for SIMPANG.ID
author: Mpribadi, Gemini

sections.description: Fetches, caches, and displays data from a remote CSV file using a shortcode with table, timeline, and chart views.
sections.changelog:
Version 1.2.0

  • New Feature: Added 'grouped-timeline' shortcode parameter for a vertical tabbed view.
  • New Feature: Timeline view includes lazy-loaded Chart.js line charts for the last 7 days of data.
  • Optimization: Data fetching is now limited to the last 1500 rows to improve performance on very large CSV files.
  • Optimization: All CSS has been moved to an external, minified stylesheet (`style.min.css`).

Version 1.0.0 - 1.1.0

  • Initial release with sortable and paginated table.
  • Added self-hosted update functionality and security hardening.
